title: Fortuna
description: For Orbit, Bradley Englert nabbed world English rights to  Fortuna , the first title in a space opera trilogy by Kristyn Merbeth.The series is about “following a family of interplanetary smugglers” in which “a young woman must assume leadership of the family’s black-market business dealings after her mother, the matriarch, steps down, only to find that she has inherited far more than a ship and a crew.” Fortuna is slated for fall 2019.
author: Kristyn Merbeth
